articles.title: Grok blocked from undressing images in places where it’s illegal, X says
articles.description: BANGKOK (AP) — Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok won’t be able to edit photos to portray real people in revealing clothing in places where that is illegal, according to a statement posted on X.
